import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as CartSvg} from '../../../icons/cart.svg' const AddProduct = ({product, addToCart, addProductToDetails}) => { const [counter, setCount] = useState() return (
Name: {product.name}
Price: {product.price.toFixed(2)}$
Origin: {product.origin.toUpperCase()}
) } export default AddProduct;
